p:
The impact of the ongoing humanitarian crisis on Venezuela's health-care workforce amplifies the country's incapacity to cope with COVID-19. The Venezuelan Medical Federation (Federación Médica Venezolana) has stated that at least 30 000 medical professionals have left the country over the last decade, contributing to a shortage of specialists.
7 Furthermore, the Venezuelan Government continues to threaten physicians and health-care workers with retaliation if they speak out publicly about COVID-19 cases.
8
